net.minecraftforge.client.event.RenderLivingEvent.Pre<T,S,M>
Type Parameters:
T - the living entity that is being rendered
M - the model for the living entity
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.event.characteristic.Cancellable, net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.event.InheritableEvent, net.minecraftforge.eventbus.internal.Event, net.minecraftforge.eventbus.internal.EventCharacteristic
Enclosing class:
RenderLivingEvent<T extends LivingEntity,S extends LivingEntityRenderState,M extends EntityModel<? super S>>
public static final class RenderLivingEvent.Pre<T extends LivingEntity,S extends LivingEntityRenderState,M extends EntityModel<? super S>> extends RenderLivingEvent<T,S,M> implements net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.event.characteristic.Cancellable
Fired before an entity is rendered. This can be used to render additional effects or suppress rendering.

This event is

invalid reference 
cancelable
, and does not
invalid reference 
have a result
. If this event is cancelled, then the entity will not be rendered and the corresponding RenderLivingEvent.Post will not be fired.

This event is fired on the main Forge event bus, only on the logical client.
